alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 11:28AM EDT until June 14 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Bamberg County in central South Carolina... Western Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1128 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Blackville to near Orangeburg, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Bamberg, Denmark, Brookdale, Bowman, Orangeburg County Airport, Claflin College, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, North, Neeses, Norway, Rowesville, Cordova, Livingston, Cope, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall, Edisto and Bamberg County Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
